title: Galas- The Fastest Being Alive
body:
Galas- The Fastest being Alive

HP 412+ 67 1.17/sec +0.41
MP 320+ 55 3.92/sec +0.39
AD 39+3.28
Atk Speed 0.641 +0.012
Armour 11 +1.6
MR 17 +2.9
Movement Speed 360

Passive: Cellular Regeneration/ Light Speed.
Being attacked while having a stack available will cause him to push away all units 540 units away,
and healing back the damage dealt. This process is over 1.25 seconds, he is also invulnerable during the process,
this is a channel effect.
For the ability to be activated he must take more than 14% of his Maximum of his Health in less than
2.25 seconds.
Gains a charge whenever he uses an ability or once every 50 seconds. Attacking reduces this by 2 seconds.
Holds maximum 2 stacks

Light Speed: After 1.5 seconds of using Lighting punch, the next basic attack within 3 seconds will become hyper-speed attacks.
Hitting 13/14/15/16 times over 1 seconds. Stunning the enemy being hit during this time, each "tick" deals 6/7/8/9% AD +6/7/8/9 AD.
This can crit, dealing 4% Bonus AD and +6/8/10/12 Damage
This counts as 1 auto attack.

Mininum damage 108.42
Maximum damage considering 700AD and crit. 1648 damage.

Q: Lightning Punch 100/120/140/160/180MP 15/14.5/14/13.5/13 Sec
The next attack will cause him to dash to his opponent within 375 range while punching, moving though
obstacles and unpassable terrain. This deals 90%AD +25/60/105/150/195 Damage. 

W: Speed Mirage. 100/120/140/160/180 MP
Channeling for 3 seconds, moving so fast he Creates clones of himself to run around and randomly attack units within 1000 units. These deal 100% basic attack damage, cannot cast spells or anything else Moves at same base movement speed. And are killed in 1 hit by champions and super minions but immune to normal minion attacks. Creates 4/7/10/13/16 mirages. If in the presence of True Sight, mirages disappear. Revealing the real Galas.
These cannot be controlled.
Gives 5 gold when killed.

E: Enhance Metabolism. No Cost 49/47/45/43/41 seconds.
Activate, Galas will start to rapidly regenerate health, healing 4/5/6/7/8% Max HP per second for 6 seconds. Immune to negative buffs and gains
10/15/20/25/30% Movement Speed and 15/25/35/45/55 AD. Lasts 6 seconds. However, after effects, Cellular Regeneration and Light Speed will be disabled for during the cooldown of this ability.

R: Out of Time/ Unstoppable 150MP 125/110/95 seconds cooldown.
Passive: Cellular regeneration can hold up to 3/4/5 stacks. All ability loses 0.5/1/1.5 seconds cooldown, this only activates while Out of Time is not in cooldown.
Active: Galas channels, draining speed from all units within 1250 range from him over 2 seconds, drains 4/5/6% Maximum Movement speed per .15 seconds.
After the channel, he will charge towards the chosen nearby enemy champion at his own movement speed + 10x movement speed drained. Dealing
175/300/425 +125%AD to all enemies in the way, and knocking them into the air before teleporting back to his original position.
he may use unstoppable within 2 seconds of hitting the target champion.

Unstoppable, Galas teleports on top of the enemy, kicking them rapidly in the face, dealing 20/45/70%AD 5 times over 2 seconds. Stunning then while at it.

please, this guy has too much defensive options and too many offensive options. You're trying to make a champ that can do everything without much effort.
A fast champion would be uber squishy, and would have lots of dashes to outplay enemies. Their damage would also be lacking. Having high movement speed in lol is honestly super OP, so it needs to be compensated for.
And his ult seems super overloaded. What's the point of draining the movement speed if it just decreases the time it takes for you to get to your foe and kick them to death? It's just a more complicated Vi ult.
but they get killed in 1 shot, any aoe ability can wipe like all of them, hit.

Or it can take a tower 16 shots to clear them out. He gains 1600% damage increase to mow a tower in less than a second. 
You've created a champion with 5 ultimate abilities

You give him massive damage, massive speed, massive regen and huge incoming damage avoidance. It's activate everything, pentakill, and by the time enemy team is back in action cooldowns are off to do it all again.

There's nothing to really critique, it's just all way too much.
